A fire at a tire shop in Queens has resulted in the destruction of an apartment building and left nine people injured, while NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani proposes a four-year extension of mayoral control over schools amidst various housing and transit initiatives.

### Risks & Alerts

- Tire shop fire destroys apartment building in Queens, leaving 9 injured. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxQYnA4UndGM253S1FNNWZ0WTg4NnEyZEgzUkNCVU9XWWlWel92clplY3dGZGpXVlRHMXlTUHN5OTVRbkg1b2NSVk1YRWZVRGc0T0J6N2pMOFJWMUVIRjFFR1BmZnFOVVVxMFoyTDFtLUJMWjk1Q2JRb0NuM0ZHVk80TjZBRWx3bjJNVDJHM1JZNTMyR0UyeFQ1aVZ6M3NFSFE3SDR2Wg?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- Gov. Hochul proposes a 4-year extension of mayoral control over NYC schools following Mamdani's reversal. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC Mayor Mamdani advocates for free bus fares while MTA plans to check fares. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mamdani reverses Adams, revives controversial Bronx housing program for sick former inmates.
